definitions.definition: To become aggressive towards the player 's character.
examples: They'll aggro on you if you get too close.

definitions.definition: To cause (a non-player character) to become aggressive towards the player 's character.
examples: I aggroed the dragon by stealing from its hoard, and it killed me.

main_definition: ( gaming , intransitive ) To become aggressive towards the player 's character.
secondary_definitions: ( gaming , transitive ) To cause (a non-player character) to become aggressive towards the player 's character.
